name: Cryo
description: Freezes an area of enemy cells for a short duration.

name: Purity
description: Reduces all negative effects from your board.

name: Inferno
description: Burns an area of filled enemy cells into empty ashes.

name: Metabolic
description: Speeds up board cooldown time for a short duration.

name: Entangle
description: Leeches powerup progress from enemy players over time.

name: Wisdom
description: Fills in a random number of empty cells on your board.

name: Landslide
description: Covers mud onto enemy cells, which must first be cleared.

name: Excavate
description: Reveals all possible number combinations for a selected area of cells.

name: Lock
description: Locks a selected number from being placed on enemy boards for a short duration.

name: Forge
description: Increases powerup progress gain for a short duration.
